Uses of Interface
com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridge

  • Packages that use PHBridge 
    Package Description
    com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk
    Provides the interfaces and classes necessary to use hue local SDK.

    • Uses of PHBridge in com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk

      Methods in com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk that return PHBridge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PHBridge PHHueSDK.getSelectedBridge()
      Setter for the selected (currently active) bridge.
      Methods in com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk that return types with arguments of type PHBridge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<PHBridge> PHHueSDK.getAllBridges()
      Returns list of bridges connected to hue SDK.
      Methods in com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk with parameters of type PHBridge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PHHueSDK.addBridge(PHBridge bridge)
      Adds connected bridge to list of available bridges for internal modules if the array list of bridge or the PHBridge object is null, then it doesn't add.
      void PHHueSDK.disableHeartbeat(PHBridge bridge)
      Disables heartbeat for requested bridge.
      boolean PHHueSDK.disconnect(PHBridge bridge)
      Disconnects the application from the bridge.
      void PHHueSDK.enableHeartbeat(PHBridge bridge, long time)
      Enables heartbeat for requested bridge with time interval in millisecond.
      boolean PHHueSDK.isHeartbeatEnabled(PHBridge bridge)
      Returns the status of heartbeat for requested bridge.
      void PHSDKListener.onBridgeConnected(PHBridge bridge)
      Called on successful connection to an access point.
      void PHSDKListener.onCacheUpdated(int flags, PHBridge bridge)
      This method is called when the SDK cache corresponding to bridge is updated.
      void PHSDKListener.onConnectionResumed(PHBridge bridge)
      Called when the connection to bridge is resumed.
      boolean PHHueSDK.removeBridge(PHBridge bridge)
      Removes connected bridge to list of available bridges for internal modules
      void PHHueSDK.setSelectedBridge(PHBridge selectedBridge)
      Sets the selected bridge.
